review: produce is great price and good quality. it is just the right size to hold my mandolin while I play.
I was surprised at the good quality for such a little price. It does exactly what I needed it for.
It works well with several different instruments that I have. Makes tuning a lot easier and accurate. It is a good value.
This is a pretty good non-expensive capo. You can spend more but this does what you need it to do.
It is easy to use and it tunes multiple instruments. It works better than my piano. I can trust that I will be in tune.
